elements.2211.03201_1f8c8f0fd6f2d7f3499627713af66: The search for gravitational waves using Pulsar Timing Arrays (PTAs) is a computationally expensive complex analysis that involves source-specific noise studies
elements.2211.03201_ce9566670eb546a57465f1064a11c: As more pulsars are added to the arrays, this stage of PTA analysis will become increasingly challenging
elements.2211.03201_16966fc0ec8ac2a8c42e37dedd34e: Therefore, optimizing the number of included pulsars is crucial to reduce the computational burden of data analysis
elements.2211.03201_0735bf89416e36ce88890e144d390: Here, we present a suite of methods to rank pulsars for use within the scope of PTA analysis
elements.2211.03201_44fd806f8ff2f4d989f4c4169a875: First, we use the maximization of the signal-to-noise ratio as a proxy to select pulsars
elements.2211.03201_b426c0e62e4ed0266c1bb7f77fabc: With this method, we target the detection of stochastic and continuous gravitational wave signals
elements.2211.03201_cae5bea172eb5606a511b45796880: Next, we present a ranking that minimizes the coupling between spatial correlation signatures, namely monopolar, dipolar, and Hellings
elements.2211.03201_c84c9d866d1faa5c2c7fbf6aa81aa: Finally, we also explore how to combine these two methods
elements.2211.03201_03beea2a3f96154cd23bd5e45a364: We test these approaches against mock data using frequentist and Bayesian hypothesis testing
elements.2211.03201_6d9fc4007457165694ad8483b1e5e: For equal-noise pulsars, we find that an optimal selection leads to an increase in the log-Bayes factor two times steeper than a random selection for the hypothesis test of a gravitational wave background versus a common uncorrelated red noise process
elements.2211.03201_477cec50af0e1de8c943ae899256e: For the same test but for a realistic EPTA dataset, a subset of 25 pulsars selected out of 40 can provide a log-likelihood ratio that is 89
elements.2211.03201_ff3b9450a4886b78edf15876a563f: of the total, implying that an optimally selected subset of pulsars can yield results comparable to those obtained from the whole array
elements.2211.03201_5b68279306058c19346b6e462f43f: We expect these selection methods to play a crucial role in future PTA data combinations.
elements.2211.03201_ffe97c1c4a102676eb46ae5bb6292: Pulsar Timing Array (PTA) experiments search for nanohertz-frequency gravitational waves (GWs) through induced shifts in radio-pulse arrival times from Galactic millisecond pulsars
elements.2211.03201_822c7ac0cd4e019e74c7610d8fcd8: The timing precision and regularity of the pulse times of arrival (TOAs) from these pulsars make them exquisite laboratories for studying a variety of astrophysical and fundamental physics phenomena
elements.2211.03201_e8e8a7491e0b5e7616d8e2d9c0daf: This includes GWs, which impart changes to the proper separation of Earth and the pulsar, causing pulses to arrive earlier or later than expected
elements.2211.03201_ac3437baa71004ca854db10f0cdf1: These timing deviations are a function of the GW source characteristics, as well as the geometry of the GW source relative to the Earth-pulsar line-of-sight
elements.2211.03201_f530c9870b6ad5f6d8676f0c47061: Upon fitting a deterministic timing ephemeris (describing leading order behavior such as the rotational period, spindown rate, etc.) to a pulsar's TOAs, the remaining timing residuals can be analysed to search for the presence of GW signals amidst noise contributions
elements.2211.03201_806b3bdf8284574ffd546c5fa03c0: In a single pulsar's timing residuals, GW signals can easily be conflated with intrinsic pulsar noise effects
elements.2211.03201_5f7d4e1b4b76d8d18291e55c5d8a0: or even poorly understood artifacts of the ionized interstellar medium that radio pulses must traverse
elements.2211.03201_70b80bfc26064fad4f55e399f2658: But by constructing an array of pulsars, the fact that the GW-induced timing deviations are correlated between pulsars can be leveraged to distinguish it from uncorrelated astrophysical and instrumental noise processes
elements.2211.03201_d0b27acb91a35359da61505816fa7: Several large collaborations have been monitoring ensembles of millisecond pulsars over long timing baselines in a bid to detect both a stochastic GW background (GWB) and individually-resolvable GW sources
elements.2211.03201_1fb09f655727ade95d0b2c11d4bb5: These include the European Pulsar Timing Array
elements.2211.03201_7049d4fb0c1c7883ef37968ee9b5b: , the North American Nanohertz Observatory for Gravitational waves
elements.2211.03201_1ab08d80edcd7d33385952913a288: , and the Parkes Pulsar Timing Array
elements.2211.03201_0a7b209330aade5be4423c49fec2b: Together with the more recently established Indian PTA
elements.2211.03201_703e4bfd876ca1d735dc352d36ce0: , these collaborations constitute the International Pulsar Timing Array
elements.2211.03201_818ecd3ece82a293df2a0b3d260c2: , which aims to synthesize the aforementioned regional efforts to achieve more significant and rapid discoveries
elements.2211.03201_bc2ddcd864b536b521ce64e945eed: Other recent timing efforts include the Chinese PTA
elements.2211.03201_e9c604e3b658bbaffe1f7126e5bcd: all show strong evidence in favor of a common-spectrum process versus independent red-noise processes with Bayes factors of order
elements.2211.03201_250d55359fe08206b25fc1a0b1979: These stochastic processes have similar spectral characteristics with estimated amplitudes around
elements.2211.03201_28d0467a2248a28be5b257a45cec0: , and are all in broad agreement with expectations for a GWB generated by an astrophysical population of supermassive black-hole binaries
elements.2211.03201_6ced9af70f1cd1bf4cf78a8dd87f8: However, there is not yet significant evidence for the distinctive pattern of inter-pulsar correlations, known as the Hellings
elements.2211.03201_7327917a6de03d3ba8894b239d2e4: Building evidence for GW-induced inter-pulsar correlations requires many well-timed pulsars in order to forge effective pairings across different angular separations in order to trace out the HD pattern
elements.2211.03201_c7e1ad605681d5aaaba0bcf2535c7: This pattern is mostly quadrupolar in angular separation, with two zero crossings between
elements.2211.03201_035e64002da1ac44dac7076698adb: Yet there are several issues associated with building an effective pulsar array for GW detection.
elements.2211.03201_0115924d3cdabd35970036c054b2d: First, we are constrained by the Galactic distribution of millisecond pulsars, so there is little reason to consider array geometries that contradict this.
elements.2211.03201_c04e5346905e48b0f908a05fa4776: Furthermore, if one were to only try to discover new pulsars that would maximize the significance of HD correlations, then the best strategy would be to survey close to the most sensitive pulsars
elements.2211.03201_ccafa78e41ff862a29b5ed314b43f: However, this would not trace the full pattern of this correlation curve, thereby severely inhibiting our ability to discriminate it from systematic noise processes that can also induce inter-pulsar correlations
elements.2211.03201_19232d3c91c2e600b042e3ecca5aa: The latter include solar-system ephemeris errors that create dipolar correlations
elements.2211.03201_b219da2b7bcc1c5282920968b3cb1: , and long-timescale systematics in time standards that create monopolar correlations
elements.2211.03201_32782d43cb8fece1c7cd41c54f6fd: Finally, the next generation of radio facilities such as DSA-2000
elements.2211.03201_9e0e6a0a69162e3362abea48e0d02: , and the next-generation Very Large Array
elements.2211.03201_0c5e7ea9b9da421dc394d3e02540f: will lead to a torrent of new pulsars and observations
elements.2211.03201_0a04c52f5d939a1f77f33f85e7ff2: Future PTA data analysts will need metrics to judge which pulsars will most effectively characterize the GWB and resolve multiple individual SMBHBs out of this confusion background
elements.2211.03201_3f34811cabc1e6d7841e318a2afa8: Therefore, exploring how to optimize the observing and analysis strategies of PTA experiments is crucial
elements.2211.03201_08c694eba8830540a928af5c76580: In previous works, computational techniques to optimize the observational schedule
elements.2211.03201_4104671185ac25b25d1d0c0254591: , and arrival-time precision as a function of radio frequency and bandwidth
elements.2211.03201_08f0d227bc52c5a1fd6f8380e77d6: , the author proposed a technique to optimize the disentangling between different spatial correlations and, therefore, to separate the signal due to GWs from that produced by clock or ephemeris errors
elements.2211.03201_761728b1aa70fb32fd0f392fb2cf9: This paper also argued that such a method could be used to decide which pulsars should be included in PTAs
elements.2211.03201_182f24d90ff2e7f798313e129f5de: Beyond standard quality checks related to a pulsar's long-term timing stability, PTA searches aim to include as many pulsars as possible
elements.2211.03201_340274151e6892cd0473252783744: However, a standard timing baseline cut of
elements.2211.03201_2bd9894fe930bb9d7054f3f74b27a: years is usually made in order to reduce the data volume while at the same time ensuring that all pulsars inform GW frequencies
elements.2211.03201_885becb7bde39a50bab95b1fbf1d4: nHz where a GW background signal should be strongest
elements.2211.03201_0d1286cad8129b683c50c72792cf4: In this work, we introduce for the first time a robust methodology for pulsar selection optimization in order to detect and characterize both the stochastic background and single continuous gravitational wave (CGW) sources
elements.2211.03201_9735c4e65e4be1acbbb92f5079b85: We develop ranking (or selection) methods to understand which pulsars contribute most to GW searches, where we target three key analyses:
elements.2211.03201_777817bc3635ac92ebbe51f771b7f: detection of a GWB versus a Common Uncorrelated Red Noise (CURN) process,
elements.2211.03201_569e497b9e0a9316cc157bb1b00eb: detection of a GWB versus Monopolar and Dipolar correlated signals,
elements.2211.03201_7e7891e14e677750692123f9ec937: These methods use statistical tools introduced in previous studies, making our methods easily implemented within established pipelines
elements.2211.03201_dfcc061af4a876f10b6f4d84b9eee: Each method takes as input the intrinsic timing and noise properties of the whole pulsar array
elements.2211.03201_8195dda08dd56a1671cd46c98d8a8: which could be potentially provided by previous data releases
elements.2211.03201_07e8747c448fd12eebcd69e6ed91d: and outputs a ranked list of pulsars for a specified GW search

elements.2211.03201_d16928e3c3471d4eb9cab3efce0b6: Ranking pulsars for stochastic signal searches
elements.2211.03201_30758472cafa2d297490faf3445bd: One of the primary goals of the current PTA experiments is to detect the stochastic GWB from a population of SMBHBs
elements.2211.03201_24da5afa2ba97ee1d6db51e216c97: An isotropic GWB manifests itself as a long timescale, low-frequency (or red) common signal across the pulsars in a PTA
elements.2211.03201_e4204ce9888885873d74f1d37ed78: This common signal is characterized by the common spectrum and the inter-pulsar spatial correlations
elements.2211.03201_4d084e1cb5622323bd7deb5ec886e: The distinctive signature of the gravitational nature lies in this correlation which depends only on the pulsar's angular separation and has an expectation value given by the HD curve
elements.2211.03201_773d1dad190aabb54fe302a02f392: Current experiments found strong evidence for the presence of a common red noise signal
elements.2211.03201_dfb576b3ebb6e4af50f8d42f09d58: While such a signal could potentially represent the expected GWB from SMBHBs, there is not yet strong evidence for either HD or other alternative angular correlations
elements.2211.03201_7b547ba4579bb1af0db3b498bb74e: Motivated by these latest results, in Sec.
elements.2211.03201_bd48d91af25e391e3df227dcaf99a: we design a method to identify the optimal subset of pulsars for increasing the confidence in the detection of an HD correlation, whereas in Sec.
elements.2211.03201_d7ab7d7a0c08766395477474a7aab: we use the decoupling formalism to find the best subset of pulsars for distinguishing this correlation from alternative hypotheses.

elements.2211.03201_fc7dab13dbeb7afab3cc8cf982787: PTA data analysis requires both significant human and computational resources
elements.2211.03201_fd3630daeb0f62def8e06a4d157f8: As the computational burden of such analyses grows with the number of pulsars, the problem will be further exacerbated by the discovery of many new pulsars by next-generation radio facilities
elements.2211.03201_cd8f15aec5c4d09b61b736541912b: In this work, we introduced the concept of pulsar selection optimization for specific analyses
elements.2211.03201_3dc86bb2ceb122f47e4b881f88139: We emphasize that the ranking procedure is not straightforward and depends on the properties of the sought signal, and the optimization requirements
elements.2211.03201_b1160dccba95cf6b9a1dfd5890221: Therefore, we considered optimal selection criteria for deterministic CGW and stochastic GWB searches separately
elements.2211.03201_c17f6276521ff22485c5c3d2d7aa8: For the GWB, we presented three different ranking methods that target different aspects of a GWB search: SNR-maximization, Coupling Matrix, and Chimera method
elements.2211.03201_5f0c3680781a2d86347a0d9b9320f: The performance of our methods was assessed using frequentist and Bayesian hypothesis testing on simulated datasets
elements.2211.03201_103ce89c3e6d8fb5f751a7aa213fd: The SNR-maximization method aims to increase the detection confidence in favor of the HD correlation with respect to a CURN process
elements.2211.03201_96689ccb68f084f4f2e2568ba43f1: Pulsars selected with this method provide an evidence for the HD vs CURN hypothesis larger than a random selection for all the considered datasets

elements.2211.03201_18f3f8f29c5bba9f1fcf3528919d2: Additionally, it was demonstrated that with this dataset we can reach 88

elements.2211.03201_36d1d328b12d5fffe965bc4a4fb90: This fact can be detrimental for disentangling the HD from other spatially correlated noise processes
elements.2211.03201_6cefd8ee18cb01ecaa4ab3ea040d2: The Coupling Matrix selection is aimed at resolving this issue by maximizing the decoupling between different correlations, so that the HD spatial mode disentangles from the monopolar and dipolar correlations

elements.2211.03201_8ad95ef7a3337322983d81e11d5c1: We stress that although a high SNR provides a steeper increase in the log-Bayes factor when HD is compared to all other considered types of common processes, it does not guarantee an optimal decoupling of spatial modes
elements.2211.03201_7c6e2ae85adc68e62440842834139: This is clearly illustrated with the Galaxy-distributed and mock MeerTime datasets.
elements.2211.03201_c76343bf111c334345b891cc04605: The purpose of these ranking methods is not to discard the analysis of some pulsars but only to evaluate their contribution to the full PTA analysis
elements.2211.03201_adcfc04f308429fedc2ea47e42f09: Even though these results depend on the noise properties of the PTA dataset considered, the selection of a subset of pulsars has been shown to be a good proxy for having an informative dataset and at the same time reducing the computational burden of the analysis
elements.2211.03201_f933c9d47ad217ba1f718ba14028f: Therefore, if a collaboration decides to limit pulsar sources due to resource restrictions, these tools will be essential for understanding how to make such a selection
